org.jetel.data

Class RecordComapratorAnyOrderType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.RecordComparator
      • org.jetel.data.RecordComapratorAnyOrderType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<DataRecord>

    public class RecordComapratorAnyOrderType
extends RecordComparator
    Compares two data records with the same structure. If the records are different but in the order conforming the ordering type, compare method returns -1, if they are in wrong order - it returns 1. That means, that for IGNORE order, method compare always returns -1 for different records.
